page.title: 15FAMILY LIFE IN BROCKWORTH
page.content: Local supermarket owners and residents were interviewed to discover {shopping habits}.Potatoes and bread were the commodities sold most each week;tinned veg.,pickles and spices the least; chicken and braising steak were the most popular meats,whilst the weekend was the busiest time. 2 {average families} reported that "We spend 50.00 weekly for food for 4"and "My household spends 45.00 weekly to feed 4.The main things bought are bread and potatoes". As regards {housework} it was done mostly by women-"I asked a few housewives about housework.They said"Its horrid"". A survey found that the most hated tasks were polishing,ironing and cooking.Perhaps {pet ownership} caused all this work-about 80% of 1 typical class had pets.
